nodes.text: Corruptor Zero was a battle droid that commanded the droid armies of the Dread Masters at the Dread Fortress on Oricon during the Galactic War. During the Dread War, Corruptor Zero was destroyed while trying to repel invading forces.
Corruptor Zero appears as the fourth boss in the Operation "The Dread Fortress," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.4.
